channel.title: Stremio News
channel.description: Latest news and updates from the Stremio Blog

item.title: Stremio Tech Update #65 – Stremio 5 Update for MacOS and Stremio 5 Release for Windows ARM
item.description: We updated the Stremio v5 app for MacOS with the following changes: new dock icon allow the screen saver during video pause We also release Stremio v5 for Windows ARM! If you want to download Stremio v5 for Windows ARM devices, you can do so from this link until the cache expires. We may or…

item.title: Stremio Tech Update #64 – Stremio Android TV Updated
item.description: We updated the Stremio Android TV app (v1.8.1) to fix an issue with some Android vendors where users could not log in or see posters, but instead would see an error saying “Failed to create cache directory for temporary files” As we have changed the cache directory to solve this issue, all users would need…

item.title: Stremio is Now Available on Fire OS Store!
item.description: After removing the “Stremio” scam app from Amazon Store recently due to trademark infringement, you can now find the official Stremio app on FireOS devices in the Amazon App Store! Stremio no longer needs to be sideloaded on any FireOS device anymore and it includes automated updates. Stay tuned as we may still have more…

item.title: Stremio Lite Released for TVs with Vidaa OS! (Hisense, Toshiba, Sharp, etc)
item.description: Stremio Lite is now available for TVs running Vidaa OS, this includes brands such as Hisense, Toshiba, Sharp, AKAI, etc. This is a global release and there is no minimum model year for TVs running Vidaa, as long as you have the latest OS updates, you should be able to find the app in the…

item.title: Stremio Tech Update #63 – Stremio VR Updated
item.description: We just updated the Stremio VR app for Meta Quest devices. Here’s what changed: Fixed an issue where the streams list would not load Fixed the order of addons (to be the same as install order) Fixed an issue where the app could freeze when opening a metadata page Fixed an issue with the HDR…

item.title: Stremio Tech Update #62 – Stremio Lite for MacOS Release
item.description: Stremio Lite now supports MacOS as a native app and can be installed from the MacOS App Store. It supports Apple native features such as Handoff and movie/tv show artwork in Control Center. Unlike the iOS app running on macOS, it supports Intel processors also, proper UI size, hiding cursor when playing a video and…

item.title: Stremio Tech Update #61 – Apple TV (tvOS) App Updated
item.description: We just released Stremio for Apple TV (tvOS) v1.3.2, here’s what changed: Redesigned buttons on metadata page Fixed loading an empty metadata page in some cases Fixed crash on board when navigating Fixed a memory leak Fixed account data not syncing on app launch Fixed crash on QR code page with tvOS 17.0 beta Stay…

item.title: Stremio Tech Update #60 – Stremio v5 for MacOS & Stremio Web Update
item.description: We released a new version of Stremio v5 for MacOS to fix an issue with the screensaver showing during playback, we also updated Stremio Web to fix opening external player with https streams. If you are already using Stremio v5 for MacOS the app should auto-update, otherwise you can download the new version from the…

item.title: Stremio Mega Update! Stremio v5 for MacOS, Usenet & Archive Streaming, Like & Loved Buttons and More!
item.description: Good news, everyone! Today we have a huge update! So big in fact that we are splitting it into numerous blog posts. Pick your destiny: Stremio v5 MacOS Release! (with ARM support) and Stremio Lite TestFlight for MacOS: https://blog.stremio.com/stremio-v5-macos-release!-(with-arm-support)/ Stremio New Streaming Sources (Usenet, FTP, RAR, ZIP, 7ZIP, TGZ, TAR): https://blog.stremio.com/stremio-new-stream-sources-usenet-rar-zip-ftp-and-more/ Stremio Liked and Loved…

item.title: Stremio New Stream Sources (Usenet, RAR, ZIP, FTP and more)
item.description: At Stremio we pride ourselves in working with streaming (as the name suggests), so today we present to you MANY new streaming capabilities. As of right now these have only been implemented in Stremio v5 for desktop with plans on gradually releasing it to other platforms too. Note: All these new streaming capabilities are still…
